creator: Joe
title: 幣安7天淨提款超36億美元！CZ：歡迎壓力測試；USDC已恢復提領
dc:creator: Joe
content:
交易所幣安近日出現提款激增現象、並在昨日暫停了 USDC 提領。對此，Binance 創辦人 CZ 回應表示平 […]

creator: Cointelegraph By   Luke Huigsloot
title: CFTC declares Ether as a commodity again in court filing
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By   Luke Huigsloot
content: The community is hopeful that the assertion by the CFTC will put to bed claims that staked coins are securities according to the Howey Test.
contentSnippet: The community is hopeful that the assertion by the CFTC will put to bed claims that staked coins are securities according to the Howey Test.
